name: Gravity is Overrated
description:
Evil aliens tied you and your friend up and left you to die in their space dungeon, but those creatures made one grave mistake: they left you with your oxygen tanks.


While constant spinning in space, you can use each of the oxygen tanks to push the astronauts in opposing directions. If you don't balance the usage of the 2 tanks they will blow up with the pressure. With patience and good reaction time you'll be out of this prision in a blink.

Controls: Hold S or D to fire oxygen. Press ESC to close the game.

This game was maded during the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Softwares used: Blender, Substance Painter and Unity.
